legal_basis: NOA to provide a detailed statement of the legal and factual basis for non-infringement claims and include drug details
evidence_assessment: expert evidence suggested a reactive layer might form
application_details: Apotex's NOA claimed no subcoating exists
decision_reasoning: fails to provide adequate factual and legal information, thus not complying with the Regulations
result_of_case: Court declared Apotex's NOA invalid, prohibiting Health Canada from issuing compliance notices until patent expiration
